thread.title: Dashawn
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Dashawn

author: Dashawn
title: Dashawn
text: I filled my taxes at the Manhattan office on 49th street. The building was very polished, immediately captivating my attention. I was welcomed by the receptionist Ms.Jones and then appointed to file my taxes with Mayra. Mayra was descriptive on the overall process, creating an aura of comfort instantly! We enjoyed conversation as she filled my taxes. I haven't enjoyed a visit in quite a while to such an institution. I will always file my taxes with R & G Brenner!
